getTaskAttributes

public java.util.List getTaskAttributes()
Returns the list of additional attributes associated with the task. In general, these task attribute methods are provided for users that wish to specify information in addition to the information represented by the task interface.

Returns:
The list of task attributes

getDeleteWhenTaskEndsFlag

public boolean getDeleteWhenTaskEndsFlag()
Returns true if this task should delete it's own record when it is done. This is useful when it is not desired to keep a record of a task.

Returns:
True if the task should be deleted when its done, false otherwise.

setDeleteWhenTaskEndsFlag

public void setDeleteWhenTaskEndsFlag(boolean flag)
Sets whether this task should delete it's own rccord when it is done.

Parameters:
flag - The task deletion flag
